item.title: Creating data bunker account in console
item.description: 1. Create a logging account from the organizations management account Best practice is to have a separate logging account for your data bunker. This account should only be accessible by folks in your security group with a read only role. How you create this account will depend on your organization’s policies, the instructions below are guidance on how to do this. If you do not currently have a landing zone setup see the quest Quick Steps to Security Success for a more in-depth discussion.
